songs.description: One night I drove an hour to the beach to hunt for bioluminescent waves before the algae bloom passed. I got there and saw nothing apart from oil rigs in the fog and sat in the sand feeling stupid, but then this song came on and I felt grateful. As I listened I saw that the ocean had started to glow.

An ex showed me this song and I listened to it whenever I was trying to get over him. I think it helped? Also good for fast walking/driving and pretending you’re on a mission instead of just going to CVS.

![](/images/image2.jpg)

I started listening to more Baltimore and Jersey club music this year. The Missy Elliott sample is perfect – the lyrics are plaintive but the song still manages to make me so happy. I just wanna be the perfect match… you don’t even have to ask!!!

songs.songname: Spring Is Coming With a Strawberry in the Mouth

songs.description: I love the little water droplet sound.

Kumo 99 is definitely going to blow up soon and it surprises me that they haven’t already. Let’s make it happen guys… I recently got to replace my disintegrating wallet with their merch.

![](/images/image1.jpg)

For looking at lights through a car window at night that flare up like you might have astigmatism (my self diagnosis from Tiktok). I also think it’s funny when you repeatedly listen to songs in languages you don’t know and end up memorizing sounds instead of the actual words.

I didn’t think I would be into brakence, but then I went to Yellowstone with Tiger and suddenly I was addicted (probably because I absorb everything he likes like a sponge)... I love brakence now and I’ve always loved Tiger, duh.
Good for feeling better than someone in a way that isn’t healthy. I like how the bass automatically makes your speakers sound blown out.

This entire album is really interesting and maybe a bit pretentious but there’s something addictive about the cadence of him saying “I was in ancient Egypt with the rabbit” in this. I was trying to find out who did the narration and discovered the entire album is performed by very polished AI text-to-speech. 2023 yeah yeah.
So nice when a friend makes music that you truly enjoy and listen to over and over and over!! This song reaches deep into my heart and rearranges things.
Rediscovered this song this year and genuinely believe it is one of the best songs ever. Every day I lie awake and pray to God today’s the day…

Emo as fuck + one of those songs where you play it for someone and feel obligated to say “just wait until it gets to the good part I swear” (3:48). Something gratifying about songs that make you work for it like that.
I have to say DJ Seinfeld’s name embarrasses me but this really carried me through a lot of this year. It makes me feel like something cool and refreshing is washing over me.

I went to an event in London and had so much fun dancing to this with strangers that I almost cried (soberly), and I fell in love with Anz. I feel like it’s rare to see a DJ smiling through their entire set because they’re having fun.
Weird fun little bop. Why Be is also just [insanely hot](https://www.youtube.com/watch?app=desktop&v=s4BzebgYBTQ) (I NEED HIM!!!)
FKA Twigs’ [recent performance of this](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CIJsZWeCz7A) really got me into this song, even though Cara Delevingne is a jumpscare.
Watched *Nowhere* by Araki for the first time and this played over the credits and felt very bittersweet.
